required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: QLF32004 Injection for the Treatment of Patients With Advanced Malignant Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: Phase Ia Clinical Study of Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Preliminary Efficacy of QLF32004 for Injection Monotherapy in Patients With Advanced Malignant Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the safety, tolerability, and recommended dose (RP2D) of QLF32004 in patients with advanced malignancies.

intervention.description: In the phase, five dose groups were proposed.The frequency of administration was once a week, and the treatment cycle was 3 weeks.
